question.ask: Questions 1~2  One of your relatives had an accident on her way home. Ask her two questions about it.

std.value: Were you driving your car then? Who called the ambulance for you?
std.ai: Were you driving your car then? Who called the ambulance for you?

std.value: When did the accident happen on your way home? How did that happen?
std.ai: When did the accident happen on your way home? How did that happen?

std.value: Did you stay in hospital for several days? How do you feel now?
std.ai: Did you stay in hospital for several days? How do you feel now?

std.value: When did the accident happen on your way home? Is that serious?
std.ai: When did the accident happen on your way home? Is that serious?

std.value: When did the accident happen on your way home? Were you driving your car then?
std.ai: When did the accident happen on your way home? Were you driving your car then?

std.value: How did that happen? Who called the ambulance for you?
std.ai: How did that happen? Who called the ambulance for you?

std.value: How did that happen? Do you remember what happened then?
std.ai: How did that happen? Do you remember what happened then?

std.value: How do you feel now? How long did you stay in hospital?
std.ai: How do you feel now? How long did you stay in hospital?

std.value: What happened to you? Who went to the hospital with you?

std.value: Did you get hurt? How long did you stay in hospital?
